publishes.title: World Wide Waste
publishes.details: I recently finished a book called World Wide Waste by Gerry McGovern. The author helps organizations reduce data waste by designing simpler, lighter, and more environmentally friendly websites and apps.

publishes.title: Do we really need class components anymore?
publishes.details: After the introduction of React Hooks, class components are no longer the only way to create stateful components in React. In this article, we will explore the differences between class components and functional components with hooks, and why you should consider using functional components with hooks instead of class components.

publishes.title: NodeJS Beginner Course
